page.title: 16POPULATION STATISTICS
page.content:
EMPLOYMENT STATISTICS -INFORMATION FROM THE PUPILS AT WHERWELL SCHOOL. TEACHERS-9 COMPUTER USERS-8 BARRISTER-1 HOUSEWIVES-19 BUILDERS-4 PLUMBER-1 SHOP ASSISSTANTS-2 SECRETARIES-2 NURSE-1 GAS BOARD OFFICIALS-2 HOSPITAL TECHNICIAN-1 POLICE-1 DRIVER-1 GREENGROCER-1 GARDENER-1 MACHINE-MAINTENANCE-1 VEHICLE MAINTENANCE-2 WRITER-1 CLEANERS-2 DECORATOR-1 CARPENTER-1
13 OF THESE WORKED IN ANDOVER,9 WORKED IN CHILBOLTON,19 AT HOME,AND THE REST IN VARIOUS TOWNS IN AN ARC ROUND THE VILLAGE OF UP TO 20 MILES,WITH 2 TRAVELLING MUCH FURTHER. 40 USE CARS,2 USE VANS,2 RODE BIKES,AND 1 USES ACAR AND THEN TRAIN.
